## Source: google-open-source-security (d1d6b36980b1999e5525b7490b4a430c21cb4f86493a11b76f34ae8c02bfc19c)
The PyPI package fabrice is a malicious package typosquatting the legitimate
package fabric. The package is an info stealer primarily focused on stealing
AWS credentials.
